title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4.8 - Application to be accompanied by photograph and fingerprints
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4.8 - Application to be accompanied by photograph and fingerprints

State Regulations

For the purpose of assisting the commission to ascertain the
identity and criminal record, if any, of the applicant, each application shall
be accompanied by a photograph and the authenticated fingerprints of the
applicant on an identification record form furnished by the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
